placeholderImages.description: A phone screen displaying a prominent 'Scam Alert' notification, representing the app's purpose.
A smartphone displaying a fake delivery notification text message.
A person looking at a fraudulent email on a computer screen, indicating a phishing attempt.
A person looks skeptically at a too-good-to-be-true job offer on a laptop.
A downward-trending graph on a tablet with stacks of coins, representing a financial scam.
A computer screen showing a red warning pop-up about a virus detection.
